<hr noshade="true" size="1" class="bucketDivider"/>

<div id="pd-available"></div>






<script type="text/javascript">
var ProductDescriptionIframeResize = {};
(function () {
  var d = document;
  var obj = this;
  var nTries = 1;
  var hasCustomWidth = 0;
  var MAX_TRIES = 20;
  obj.iframeId = 'product-description-iframe';
  obj.appendTo = 'iframe-wrapper';
  function getDocHeight (doc) {
    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById("pdIframeContent");
    var docHeight = 0;
    if(contentDiv){
      docHeight = Math.max(
        contentDiv.scrollHeight,
        contentDiv.offsetHeight,
        contentDiv.clientHeight
      );
    }
    return docHeight;
  }  
  function isElementOnRight(pdRef, el) {
    var ret=0;
    try {
      if(pdRef, el) {
        if((el.offsetTop < pdRef.offsetTop) && (el.offsetTop + el.offsetHeight > pdRef.offsetTop)) {
          ret = 1;
        }
      }
    } catch (e) {}
    return ret;
  }
  function setWidth(iframeRef, el) {
    var elLeft, w, minW = 450;
    try {
      elLeft = el.offsetLeft;
      w = elLeft - 50;
      if(w > minW) {
        iframeRef.style.width = w + 'px';
        hasCustomWidth = 1;
      }
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  function setIframeWidth(ifrmId) {
    var iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId),
        pdRef = d.getElementById("pd-available"),
        rightCol = d.getElementById("rightCol"),
        rightRail = d.getElementById("rightRail");
    if(isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightRail)) {
      setWidth(iframeRef, rightRail); 
    } else if (isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightCol)) {
      setWidth(iframeRef, rightCol);
    }
  }
  function setIframeHeight (ifrmId) {
    var iframeDoc, iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId);
    try {
      iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentWindow.document;
    } catch (e) {
      try {
        iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentDocument;
      } catch (ex) {}
    }
    if (iframeDoc) {
      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);
      if (h && h != 0) {
        iframeRef.style.height = h + 'px';
      } else { 
        if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {
          nTries++;
          setTimeout(function () {
            setIframeHeight(ifrmId);
          }, 50); 
        }
      }
    }
  }
  obj.iframeload = function () {
    var iframe = d.getElementById(obj.iframeId);
    iframe.style.display = '';
    iframe.style.height = "1px";
    setTimeout(function () {
      if(obj.needWidthAdjust) {
        setIframeWidth(obj.iframeId);
      }
      setIframeHeight(obj.iframeId);
      var onloadCallback = obj.onloadCallback;
      if(typeof onloadCallback === "function") {
        onloadCallback();
      }
    }, 50); 

  }
  obj.createIframe = function ( iframeId, onloadFn ) {
    var iframe = d.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = iframeId;
    iframe.className = "ap_never_hide";
    iframe.width = "100%";
    iframe.scrolling="no";
    iframe.frameBorder="0";
    if ( iframe.addEventListener )
      iframe.addEventListener("load", onloadFn, false);
    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )
      iframe.attachEvent("onload", onloadFn);
    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;
    return iframe; 
  }
  obj.initialize = function (onloadCallback, needWidthAdjust) {
    var iframeContent = "%0A%20%20%0A%0A%0A%0A%3Chtml%3E%0A%20%20%3Chead%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3Cstyle%20type%3D%27text%2Fcss%27%3E%0A%0A%0A%20h2%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20color%3A%23333%20%21important%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-size%3A21px%20%21important%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20line-height%3A%201.3%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20padding-bottom%3A%204px%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-weight%3A%20normal%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-family%3AArial%2C%20sans-serif%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%0A%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%0Abody%20%7B%0A%20%20background-color%3A%20%23FFFFFF%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%0A%20%20height%3A%20100%25%3B%0A%20%20width%3A%20100%25%3B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23333333%3B%0A%20%20word-wrap%3A%20break-word%3B%20%0A%20%20font-family%3A%20verdana%2Carial%2Chelvetica%2Csans-serif%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%20small%3B%0A%7D%0A%0Atd%2C%20th%20%7B%0A%20%20font-family%3A%20verdana%2Carial%2Chelvetica%2Csans-serif%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%20small%3B%0A%7D%0A%0Ahr%20%7B%0A%20%20border-top%3A%201px%20dashed%20%23999999%3B%0A%20%20height%3A%201px%3B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23FFFFFF%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%203px%200px%3B%0A%20%20border-style%3A%20dashed%20none%20none%20none%3B%0A%20%20background-color%3A%20white%0A%7D%0Aul%20%7B%20%0A%20%20list-style-type%3A%20none%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%20%0A%20%20padding%3A%200px%3B%20%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20%7B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200.5em%200em%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20ul%20%7B%0A%20%20list-style-type%3A%20none%3B%0A%20%20margin-left%3A%2025px%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20ul%20li%20%7B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200em%3B%0A%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20%7B%20padding%3A%205px%200em%3B%20%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20div.content%20%7B%20margin%3A%200.5em%200px%200em%2025px%3B%20%7D%0Ahr%20%7B%20margin-left%3A%200px%3B%20%7D%0A.bucket%20h3%20%7B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23000%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%201em%3B%0A%20%20font-weight%3A%20bold%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%200px%200.25em%200px%3B%0A%7D%0Ahr.bucketDivider%20%7B%20clear%3A%20left%3B%20%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20%7B%20padding%3A%205px%200em%3B%20%7D%0A.disclaim%20%7B%0A%     obj.onloadCallback = onloadCallback;
    obj.needWidthAdjust = needWidthAdjust;
    var iframe = obj.createIframe (obj.iframeId, obj.iframeload);
    var wrapper = d.getElementById(obj.appendTo);
    wrapper.innerHTML = '';

    var anchor = d.createElement('div');
    anchor.id = 'biss-product-description-and-details';
    wrapper.appendChild(anchor);

    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);
    var doc;
    try {
      doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;
    } catch (e) {
      try {
        doc = iframe.contentDocument;
      } catch (ex) {}
    }
    if (doc && doc.open) {
      obj.doc = doc;
      var docOpen = doc.open();
      if (docOpen) {
	docOpen.write(decodeURIComponent(iframeContent));
        doc.close();
      }
    }
  }
  obj.resizeIframe = function() {
    if(hasCustomWidth) {
      setIframeWidth(obj.iframeId);
    }
    nTries = 1;
    setIframeHeight(obj.iframeId);
  }
}).apply(ProductDescriptionIframeResize);

     if(typeof P !== "undefined"){  
      P.when('cf').execute(function(){
        P.when('jQuery').execute(function(jQuery) {
          setTimeout(function() {
                var iframeLoadFn = function() {
                    var $ = jQuery;
                    $("#pd-available").trigger("pdAvailable");
                    $(window).resize(ProductDescriptionIframeResize.resizeIframe);
                };
                    ProductDescriptionIframeResize.initialize(iframeLoadFn, 1);
           },50);
          });
        });
     }
</script>



<div id="iframe-wrapper"></div>

<script>
          P.when("A").execute("books-entity-teaser", function (A) { 
              var elem = A.$("#books-entity-teaser");
              function scrollObserver() {
                  if (A.onScreen(elem, 400)) {
                      A.off("scroll", scrollObserver);
                      A.get("/gp/product/features/entity-teaser/books-entity-teaser-ajax.html?ASIN=B01MSYH43Q&PRODUCT_GROUP=ebooks_display_on_website", {
                          cache: true,
                          success: function(data) {
                              elem.html(data); 
                          }
                      }); 
                   }
               }
               A.on("scroll", scrollObserver); 
          });

</script>

When you click on a Sponsored Product ad, you will be taken to an Amazon detail page where you can learn more about the product and purchase it.</p>    <p>        To learn more about Amazon Sponsored Products,<span class="a-letter-space"></span>        <a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" title="click here" href="https://advertising.amazon.com/products-self-serve?ref_=ext_amzn_wtsp">click here</a>.    </p></div><script type="text/javascript">(function(f) {f(window.P._namespace("FirebirdSpRendering"));}(function(P) {   P.when('A', 'a-carousel-framework', 'AmazonClicks').execute(function (A, CF, AC) {     CF.getCarousel(document.getElementById("sp_detail2"));     AC.registerFeedbackEvents("sp_detail2_carousel", "sp_detail2_feedbackMessage", "Ad feedback", "Hide feedback", "pa_feedbackForm_container_sp_detail2");   });   P.when('A', 'SPHAT').execute(function(A, SPHAT) {     var containerSelector = "#sp_detail2 div";     var elementsAllowedToBeHidden = ['script', 'div.sp_adID', 'div.pa_feedbackForm_container_sp_detail2', 'span.a-declarative', 'span.aok-hidden', 'input[type=hidden]', 'noscript'];     var csmCounterMetricName = 'sp_detail2.adb';     var hadImpact = SPHAT.checkForHiddenElements(containerSelector, elementsAllowedToBeHidden, csmCounterMetricName);     A.state("sp_detail2", { adBlockerHadImpact: hadImpact});   });   P.when('SponsoredProductsViewability').execute(function(SV) {     SV.registerAuiEvents(['ready', 'scroll', 'resize', 'orientationchange']);   });}));</script>

href="/gp/customer-reviews/R3FWAS5PCDAXSG/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B01MSYH43Q"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-3 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">3.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R3FWAS5PCDAXSG/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B01MSYH43Q">The story did come to an ending, but it wasn't closure.</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">April 27, 2018</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary"></span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div aria-live="polite" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px; _height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">This is a series that started out interesting with interesting characters and then slowly descended into the muck of cliché plot and obvious betrayals that it seems many stories run into.<br /><br />I can't really go deep into detail on what struck me about this series without revealing spoilers, especially for books 3 and 4, which seemed to have the majority of the really obvious plot devices.<br /><br />The sad thing is that I really liked the characters at first and I thought the idea had a ton of potential, but the nature of the peril the characters were in, along with how narrowly Michelle worked on her character development and plot meant that there were multiple times where I just didn't care about any of the characters.  The end is a nice play on several clichés, but it annoyed me far more than it impressed me.<br /><br />Overall, this is a series that started out as a strong 4 star in book one, but by book 4 was definitely struggling to hold onto 3 star status in my mind.  It just couldn't seem to remain high quality as the story slowly devolved rather than developed.</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-ux-click><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

class="a-icon-alt">3.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/RHZKJHGQL4R2W/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B01MSYH43Q">Not bad but very simplisic in plot and story</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">August 20, 2018</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary"></span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div aria-live="polite" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px; _height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">It had a lot of potential but in too many places it fell flat. The main character was given a copy of a three hundred year old scroll and told to solve the mystery by her magic teacher who then just walked off. There were a couple of places in the series where the "Heroes" were facing real trouble but the story had too many deus ex machina moments for the sake of convenience. There was a lot of potential but it just seemed wasted.<br /><br />Won't tell you not to buy as it was an interesting story.</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-ux-click><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

    <span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><span class="a-declarative" data-action="cr-popup" data-cr-popup="{&quot;width&quot;:&quot;580&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;ReportAbuse&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/hz/reviews-render/report-abuse?ie=UTF8&amp;voteDomain=Reviews&amp;ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_hlp&amp;csrfT=ggBcmtKJtEYl60GTiRAJcsirn882Avo9vzuqHSYAAAAJAAAAAFuYE6xyYXcAAAAAFVfwLBerPie4v1Ep%2F%2F%2F%2F&amp;entityId=RHZKJHGQL4R2W&amp;sessionId=142-9931684-0706136&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;380&quot;}"><a class="a-size-base a-link-normal a-color-secondary report-abuse-link a-text-normal" href="/hz/reviews-render/report-abuse?ie=UTF8&voteDomain=Reviews&ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_hlp&csrfT=ggBcmtKJtEYl60GTiRAJcsirn882Avo9vzuqHSYAAAAJAAAAAFuYE6xyYXcAAAAAFVfwLBerPie4v1Ep%2F%2F%2F%2F&entityId=RHZKJHGQL4R2W&sessionId=142-9931684-0706136">Report abuse</a></span></span></span>

</div></div></div><div id="R2VN12J0Y05B31" data-hook="review" class="a-section review"><div id="customer_review-R2VN12J0Y05B31" class="a-section celwidget"><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini"><a href="/gp/profile/amzn1.account.AFFLPPHEMZKI5ZMRYQNU4DD7J2XA/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_gw_tr?ie=UTF8" class="a-profile" data-a-size="small"><div aria-hidden="true" class="a-profile-avatar-wrapper"><div class="a-profile-avatar"><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/grey-pixel.gif" class="a-lazy-loaded" data-src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"><noscript><img src="https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/amazon-avatars-global/default._CR0,0,1024,1024_SX48_.png"></noscript></div></div><div class="a-profile-content"><span class="a-profile-name">Don</span></div></a></div><div class="a-row"><a class="a-link-normal" title="1.0 out of 5 stars" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R2VN12J0Y05B31/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B01MSYH43Q"><i data-hook="review-star-rating" class="a-icon a-icon-star a-star-1 review-rating"><span class="a-icon-alt">1.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class="a-letter-space"></span><a data-hook="review-title" class="a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold" href="/gp/customer-reviews/R2VN12J0Y05B31/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B01MSYH43Q">Doesn't Cast a Spell</a></div><span data-hook="review-date" class="a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date">September 7, 2018</span><div class="a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip"><span data-hook="format-strip-linkless" class="a-color-secondary"></span><i class="a-icon a-icon-text-separator" role="img" aria-label="|"></i><span data-hook="avp-badge-linkless" class="a-size-mini a-color-state a-text-bold">Verified Purchase</span></div><div class="a-row a-spacing-small review-data"><span data-hook="review-body" class="a-size-base review-text"><div aria-live="polite" data-a-expander-name="review_text_read_more" data-a-expander-collapsed-height="300" class="a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-expander-partial-collapse-container" style="max-height:300px; _height:300px"><div data-hook="review-collapsed" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content">A young adult series in the general category of books by Rick Riordan and J.K. Rowling, but with writing that's not even close to those two masters. Cardboard characters, predictable settings and too-convenient plot twists, with the required dash of tragedy. Nicole moves to a new high school when her stepdad (her real dad, unbeknownst to her, is Apollo) gets a new job. At her new school she learns she's a witch and several classmates are too, learning under the the direction of a wise old senior witch. The new town, of course, has a sort of Hell mouth, and Nicole and her friends each have control over one of the elements of nature (hence, "Elementals"). Together they battle forces of Greek mythological evil. You get the idea? Still, it's cheap and sometimes you just want some bedtime reading that isn't going to surprise you. Also, there's nothing in it you  wouldn't want a child to read -- unless you have an issue with the whole idea of witchcraft.</div><div class="a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header"><div class="a-expander-content-fade"></div><a href="javascript:void(0)" data-hook="expand-collapse-read-more-less" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-declarative" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read more&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;Read less&quot;}" data-ux-click><i class="a-icon a-icon-extender-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Read more</span></a></div></div></span></div><div data-hook="review-comments" class="a-row review-comments"><span class="cr-vote" data-hook="review-voting-widget">

  <div class="cr-helpful-button aok-float-left">
      <span class="a-button a-button-small"><span class="a-button-inner"><a href="https://www.amazon.com/ap/signin?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB01MSYH43Q%2Fref%3Dcm_cr_dp_d_vote_lft%3Fie%3DUTF8%26voteInstanceId%3DR2VN12J0Y05B31%26voteValue%3D1%26csrfT%3DgiafFOkrm32j5IkXzr4GXujfRrhGT8DHqxcMwhkAAAAJAAAAAFuYE6xyYXcAAAAAFVfwLBerPie4v1Ep%252F%252F%252F%252F%23R2VN12J0Y05B31&openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.assoc_handle=usflex&openid.mode=checkid_setup&openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0" data-hook="vote-helpful-button" class="a-button-text" role="button"><div class="cr-helpful-text">

    </table>
    </div>
  </div>

  </div>











            
      








            
            
  <script type="text/javascript">
    // Only execute if performance object is defined in JS
    if(typeof performance!= "undefined" && typeof performance.getEntries != "undefined") {




        var metaAssetNames = [];
        metaAssetNames.push("USMediaDetailPageMetaAsset_TURBO_DESKTOP");
        metaAssetNames.push("AuthorFollowAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("KindleEducationDetailPageAssets");
        metaAssetNames.push("DetailPageDigitalBulkAssets");
        if(metaAssetNames.length > 0)  {
            for(assetIndex = 0; assetIndex < metaAssetNames.length; assetIndex ++) {
	     var metaAssetName = metaAssetNames[assetIndex];
             var re = new RegExp("\\.css\\?AUIClients/" + metaAssetName); 
             for(i = 0; i < performance.getEntries().length; i++) {	   	
                var dpEntry = performance.getEntries()[i];
		var res = dpEntry.name.match(re);
                if(res && dpEntry.initiatorType  && dpEntry.initiatorType == "link") {
                    var dpmaDuration = dpEntry.duration;
                    ue.count(metaAssetName +".duration", dpmaDuration);
                    if(dpmaDuration < 50) {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "Cached");
                    } else {
                        ue.tag(metaAssetName + "NotCached");
                    }
                    ue.count(metaAssetName + ".startTime", dpEntry.startTime);
                }
	      }
	    }
        }
        else {
                ue.count("DPMANoMetaAsset", 1);
        }

        for(i = 0 ; i < performance.getEntries().length ; i++) {
            var name = performance.getEntries()[i].name ;
            var res = name.match(/\.css\?AUIClients\/AmazonUI/);
	    var initiatorType = performance.getEntries()[i].initiatorType;
            if(res && initiatorType && initiatorType == "link") {
                var duration = performance.getEntries()[i].duration ;
                ue.count("aui.duration", duration);
                ue.count("aui.startTime", performance.getEntries()[i].startTime);
                if(duration < 50) {
                    csmTag = "auiCached";
                }
                else {
                    csmTag = "auiNotCached";
                }

                if(window.ue && ue.tag) {
                    ue.tag(csmTag);
                }
                break;
            }
        }
    }
</script>

  <script type='text/javascript'>
      window.$Nav && $Nav.declare('config.prefetchUrls', ["https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/authportal/common/images/amazon_logo_no-org_mid._CB153387053_.png","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/authportal/common/images/amznbtn-sprite03._CB395592492_.png","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/authportal/flex/reduced-nav/ap-flex-reduced-nav-2.0._CB309092102_.js","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/authportal/flex/reduced-nav/ap-flex-reduced-nav-2.1._CB343920894_.css","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/gno/sprites/nav-sprite-global_bluebeacon-V3-1x_optimized._CB474516462_.png","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/buttons/sign-in-secure._CB192194766_.gif","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/login/fwcim._CB471568891_.js","https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/x-locale/common/transparent-pixel._CB386942464_.gif"]);

<script type="text/javascript">
  window.$Nav && window.$Nav.build('PldnLocalStorage', function() {
    var PldnLocalStorage = function() {};

    PldnLocalStorage.prototype.setItem = function(key, obj) {
      if (typeof obj !== 'string') {
        obj = window.JSON && window.JSON.stringify(obj);
      }

      try {
        window.localStorage && window.localStorage.setItem(key, obj);
        return true;
      } catch (exception) {
        return false;
      };
    };

    PldnLocalStorage.prototype.getItem = function(key) {
      try {
        return window.localStorage && window.localStorage.getItem(key);
      } catch(exception) {};
    };

    return new PldnLocalStorage();
  });

  window.$Nav && window.$Nav.when('PldnLocalStorage').run('PldnUcolCheck', function(storage) {
    if (!storage.getItem('amazonSmileCampaigns')) {
      storage.setItem('amazonSmileCampaigns', {
        "ucol": {
          "optOut": false,
          "hits": [
            {
              "date": new Date(),
              "redirect": false,
              "optOut": false
            }
          ]
        }
      });
    }
  });
</script>
